services.name: AI Sales Coach
services.overview: The AI Sales Coach is a personalized, AI-driven coaching platform designed to enhance sales skills through real-time feedback and guidance during sales simulations and role-playing exercises. It addresses the limitations of traditional sales training programs by providing scalable, personalized coaching that adapts to individual learning styles and performance levels. The platform leverages Natural Language Processing (NLP) and speech recognition to analyze sales interactions, pinpoint areas for improvement, and deliver tailored coaching tips. A virtual sales environment provides a safe and realistic space for trainees to practice their skills and receive immediate feedback, leading to faster onboarding, improved sales performance, and reduced coaching costs. The AI Sales Coach empowers sales teams to refine their techniques, master objection handling, and ultimately close more deals.
problems_addressed: Lack of personalized feedback in traditional sales training.
Difficulty scaling coaching resources to meet growing sales team needs.
Inconsistent coaching quality across different trainers and regions.
Slow onboarding process for new sales hires due to limited personalized support.
Inability to provide realistic and risk-free practice environments for sales skills development.
target_users: Sales trainees and new sales hires
core_features: Real-time Feedback: Provides immediate feedback on sales interactions, including tone analysis, messaging effectiveness, and objection handling.
Personalized Coaching Plans: Generates customized coaching plans based on individual performance and areas for improvement, tracked through a personalized dashboard.
Virtual Sales Environment: Simulates realistic sales scenarios with interactive virtual customers and customizable environments, allowing for safe practice.
Speech and NLP Analysis: Utilizes advanced speech recognition and NLP to analyze spoken and written communication during sales interactions, identifying key patterns and areas for optimization.
Performance Tracking and Reporting: Offers comprehensive performance tracking and reporting tools to monitor progress, identify trends, and measure the impact of coaching on sales outcomes.
user_journeys: A new sales hire logs into the AI Sales Coach platform. They select a training module focused on handling customer objections. The platform presents a virtual sales environment with a simulated customer. The new hire practices their pitch, and the AI provides real-time feedback on their tone, messaging, and objection handling techniques. After the simulation, the AI generates a personalized coaching plan with specific areas to focus on and resources for further learning. The sales manager can monitor the new hire's progress and provide additional support as needed.
ai_capabilities: NLP for analyzing sales conversations to understand sentiment, identify key topics, and assess communication effectiveness.  Model: GPT-3.5 or GPT-4 for text analysis and summarization.
Speech recognition for transcribing and analyzing spoken interactions, including tone and pace detection. Model: OpenAI Whisper for speech-to-text transcription.

Machine learning models for personalized coaching recommendations based on individual performance data and identified areas for improvement. Model: Regression models for performance prediction; collaborative filtering for personalized recommendation.
Virtual customer behavior modeling to create realistic and engaging sales simulations. Model: Reinforcement learning for adaptive customer responses.

input_data_types: Text transcripts of sales interactions (chat, email)
Sales performance data (e.g., deals closed, conversion rates)
data_schema_recommendations: Users Table: user_id (INT, PRIMARY KEY), name (VARCHAR), email (VARCHAR), role (VARCHAR), experience_level (VARCHAR)
Conversations Table: conversation_id (INT, PRIMARY KEY), user_id (INT, FOREIGN KEY), timestamp (TIMESTAMP), transcript (TEXT), audio_url (VARCHAR)
Performance Table: performance_id (INT, PRIMARY KEY), user_id (INT, FOREIGN KEY), metric (VARCHAR), value (FLOAT), timestamp (TIMESTAMP)
CoachingPlans Table: plan_id (INT, PRIMARY KEY), user_id (INT, FOREIGN KEY), plan_details (JSONB)
data_sources: User input via the AI Sales Coach platform
data_requirements.privacy_and_compliance: GDPR and CCPA compliance for handling user data.  Secure storage of audio recordings and transcripts.  Anonymization of data for training ML models.

required_integrations: CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot) for importing sales performance data and user information.
Communication platforms (Zoom, Microsoft Teams) for recording and analyzing sales conversations.
Learning Management Systems (LMS) for integrating with existing training programs.
Email providers (SendGrid, Mailgun) for sending personalized coaching tips and progress reports.
integration_plan.authentication_strategy: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for secure API authentication.  OAuth 2.0 for integrating with third-party services (e.g., CRM, communication platforms).  Clerk or Auth0 for user authentication and management.

technical_specifications.architecture: The AI Sales Coach platform will utilize a microservices architecture with separate services for the frontend, backend, AI processing, and database.  API layer for communication between services.  Asynchronous message queue (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) for handling large volumes of data.

recommended_tech_stack.frontend: Next.js 14 App Router, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui, Vercel conventions
recommended_tech_stack.backend: Node.js / Next.js server actions / Vercel serverless functions
recommended_tech_stack.database: Planetscale / Supabase / PostgreSQL with schema notes
recommended_tech_stack.storage: Supabase storage / AWS S3 / Vercel Blob
recommended_tech_stack.AI: OpenAI API, embeddings, vector DB (Pinecone/Supabase vectors)
recommended_tech_stack.APIs: REST APIs for communication between services.
recommended_tech_stack.CI_CD: GitHub â†’ Vercel automatic deploy pipeline

API_design: /api/users: GET (retrieve user profile), POST (create new user)
/api/conversations: POST (upload sales conversation audio), GET (retrieve conversation analysis)
/api/coaching_plans: GET (retrieve personalized coaching plan), POST (generate new coaching plan)
frontend_components: User dashboard: Displays personalized coaching plan, performance metrics, and progress tracking.
Virtual sales environment: Interactive simulation with virtual customers and customizable settings.
Feedback panel: Real-time feedback on sales interactions, including tone analysis, messaging effectiveness, and objection handling.
Reporting dashboard: Comprehensive performance reports and analytics for sales managers.

deployment_instructions: Environment variables: OPENAI_API_KEY, DATABASE_URL, SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_ANON_KEY, JWT_SECRET.
Vercel deployment: Configure Vercel project to deploy frontend and backend from GitHub repository. Set environment variables in Vercel project settings.
Build outputs: Frontend: static files; Backend: serverless functions. Runtime settings: Node.js version 18 or higher.

pricing_strategy: SaaS subscription tiers: Basic, Premium, Enterprise. Basic: limited features, limited users. Premium: more features, more users. Enterprise: unlimited features, dedicated support.
Usage-based pricing: Pay-per-conversation analysis. Charge per audio minute processed.
Add-ons: Additional virtual sales environments, personalized coaching content.
customer_segments: Small businesses with small sales teams.
Mid-market companies with growing sales organizations.
Enterprises with large and distributed sales forces.

success_metrics: Operational KPIs: Number of active users, number of conversations analyzed, platform uptime.
AI performance KPIs: Accuracy of speech recognition, accuracy of sentiment analysis, relevance of coaching recommendations.
Adoption/engagement KPIs: User engagement (time spent on platform), completion rate of coaching plans, user satisfaction (NPS score).
